issue.title: [CF 1066] Notification Firing when condition is false.
issue.body:
I am not sure if it's a bug or just a design goal but the icon notification are still firing when the icon condition are false.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Load the Test Icon below and change the spell from death and decay to something else.
2. Use that spell
3. You will get a chat notification

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
The icon is set to not fire when you are outside and it doesn't show which work properly but the notification that it should say something when the icon show up still fire and print to chat.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
v7.2.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
There are no error log

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

I discovered the issue when I ran LFR Imperator and the icon started whispering everyone for Branded while I set it to not show in a LFR Group.

comments.body:
Working as intended. Conditions only affect whether or not the icon is shown. You need to enable the Only handle if icon is shown option on the notification if you don't want it to fire when the icon isn't shown.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
